message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you can have the remaining 10%.  We can adjust from there if you'd like.
I think a 60/40 split is fairer. It acknowledges your initial proposal, but also gives me a more reasonable share. Let's see if we can make this work.
I'm willing to compromise. I'll take 70% and you can have 30%. We need to move towards an agreement quickly, otherwise, the value of the money will keep decreasing for me.
Let's split the money equally.  This way we both get a fair share and avoid the further devaluation of the money due to inflation. It's a win-win situation.
